00087 
00088     // Retrieve the feature matrix from the observation.
00089     Matrix myObs = obs.getFeatures();
00090 
00091     // Check size assumptions
00092     assert(myObs.size1() == (size_t)getObsRows());
00093     assert(myObs.size2() == 1); // Single agent
00094 
00095     myObs.clear();
00096 
00097     // Fill in the observations for each row of the matrix
00098     // There's only one column, column 0.
00099     // [WRITE CODE HERE]
00100     // myObs(0, 0) = some value;
00101     // myObs(1, 0) = some value;
00102     // ...
00103     // myObs(getObsRows()-1, 0) = some value;
00104 
00105     // Note, don't do anything that affects the state of the 
00106     // simulator. You never know if getObservation() will
00107     // be called more than once between doAction()

00109 }
